alert.note: Alert for Schuyler (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 2:19PM CDT until April 20 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Schuyler County in west central Illinois... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 218 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Golden, or 11 miles north of Quincy Regional Airport, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Schuyler County, including the following locations... Camden, Huntsville, Doddsville and Weinberg King State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for west central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
